alert.note: Alert for Cobb; DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:42PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Rockdale, DeKalb, northern Fayette, eastern Cobb, western Gwinnett, northwestern Henry, Clayton and central Fulton Counties through 615 PM EST ... At 541 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Mount Bethel to near Sandy Creek, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Decatur, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree Corners, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Smyrna, Dunwoody, Peachtree City, East Point, Duluth, Stockbridge, Union City, Sugar Hill, and Forest Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cobb; DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton
